website_summaries.verdict: This simple kit is created to help make repairs and do small leatherworking projects.
pros: Includes leather stitching tools to help you make a bag or to repair stitching on leather goods
Works very well on thin leather
cons: A good repair kit, but does not include any stamps for decorative work

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, I would recommend these supplies for you, no matter the stamps, the edgers, and the groovers, everything worked fine. If you plan on doing a lot of good leather work, just buy it even this on a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Lee

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but could be better, but customer service is great
customer_reviews.text: I would say as a first time leather worker, the kit worked for what I needed it to. The groover did not cut into the leather but just pressed it down. Broke several needles on the first project and I contacted company and they sent out 2 more pack of needles, however I am still waiting on them. I would say overall a good price for seeing if you want to get into leather working!
customer_reviews.author: CaniacGirl

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten around to using this before the return window was up. Yhos kit is useless and is not user friendly. I tried to sew a whole in a leather jacket and could only make one stitch before the needle got caught and made the hole worse. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stasia Sutton

customer_reviews.title: good kit
customer_reviews.text: Looks good works well. I was looking for a repair kit for a hiking boot. Had to replace an eyelet nylon strap that pulled off, Found a piece of nylon webbing and made one. The kit made it easy to sew on. Works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it it’s exactly as pictured and it works great. I actually bought this kit to use the needles and thread for bookbinding and was a little on the fence but I’m happy I bought it
customer_reviews.author: anaya

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this kit for a few months now and it has nearly everything a beginner needs to get into leather crafting. Amazing bang for the buck with decent quality items. Everything came packaged well with plenty of padding for shipping and a little sheet explaining each items use.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Aime

customer_reviews.title: Needs a case and some kind of starter book that tells you what each piece is used for.
customer_reviews.text: The combination is great! It needs a case and an instruction book on what each piece is used for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to leather working and I haven't managed to break any of this stuff so, I'd say it's of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice kit, takes little practice to use it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice kit, it'll take some time and lot's of YouTube videos to understand and master (at least a little) how to get good results, but you can really fix minor leather issues.
customer_reviews.author: Máximo Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Needle broke
customer_reviews.text: First time I used this the largest needle broke at the eye..... got a better quality one at the craft store. Nicely stocked with thread and tools but quality is lacking on the needles in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: WK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This is all you need for beginners. Love the kit !!! Arrived on time and packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy needles
customer_reviews.text: The needles were of poor quality and 3 of them broke before using my own needle but at least I was able to use the thread.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L Wolos

customer_reviews.title: My husband was pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on a lightning deal and glad I did. Good deal for the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these items to sew leather purses. I can’t wait to get started!
customer_reviews.author: One Putt

customer_reviews.title: Good collection of heavy duty threads and needles.
customer_reviews.text: The scissor item was broken upon delivery due to poor design.
customer_reviews.author: skip

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little kit for my husband to try out a new hobby and he LOVES IT! It doesn't have all the essentials in it but for beginners its perfect. The sheet of leather wont get you to far if your trying to make like something big but the value seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Zane Hradecky

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: For something so inexpensive, it is perfect. Im using it for book binding and it works nicely. The awls do not look like fancy well made awls that will stand the test of time, but are perfectly fine for the price and for a beginner trying out a new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqulyn

customer_reviews.title: Beginner friendly
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners. Obviously does not have everything you need but it's a enough for those who are just starting.
customer_reviews.author: maria cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a great jump-off point to a new hobby. The tools are good quality. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: F. A. Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have a lot of the stuff I thought would be in a beginner kit. A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: evilbrain

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Essential product - has everything you need for leather work
customer_reviews.author: orenh99

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: its a good buy and the price is fair. I was able to sew the leather set cover of my hubby's car.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Twitty

customer_reviews.title: Present for husband was a hit
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit for my husband. He loved it even though I apparently doubled up on some tools.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good tools.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great starter leather working kit. Some items are a tad cheap and flimsy. Overall good kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works for me, good set for wat I need a more, great value for the money and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: hern.luis

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my project, I’m a beginner but By making 2 of these I made my money back on the kit and the leather!
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn mahan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Came really fast and seems very durable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: rshcharizma1

customer_reviews.title: Received it yesterday....
customer_reviews.text: Started working with it the next day and the sewing awl broke. I guess you get what you pay for, but I thought it would be good to learn off of... I guess I should have bought a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: andrew c

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Every item works well. Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I like it but would have preferred a hole punch that wasnt àutomated.
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: no good product
customer_reviews.text: Some of the sewing needle are fake I was ready to use them then sadly the main needle i was hope to used then it broke while I was using the handle grip came apart no good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good pack for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It is a good pack for beginners. However, one of the needles broke wile using! That is why I am giving it four stars
customer_reviews.author: Hojjat

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit after purchasing a fur coat that needed minor repairs. Definitely saved me some money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat the tools for the price, much better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is ideal for someone who is just starting to learn leatherwork.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This set is great for a beginner. It works well for thin leather, haven’t tried a thicker leather yet.
customer_reviews.author: jill chaney

customer_reviews.title: Give what we order
customer_reviews.text: Did not send proper thread color or patch No good and dont no how to return. Need burgundy pls send 1 thread and patch
customer_reviews.author: GRAHAM G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The tools in the set are easy to use even for me as someone who never repaired shoes before.
customer_reviews.author: kisabanzira

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: The waxed thread worked great for repairing the sheath for my hunting knife
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Lickfold

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Came with everything needed for my repair. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria LHeureux

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It came with every thing I needed for my leather projects. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Sara jensen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used to fix a belt. It was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fix it, mend it  and stitch it.
customer_reviews.text: Still learning how to use it but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Meshay

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. Items were a little cheap, but it makes a good starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Just “okay”
customer_reviews.text: The stamps are only really good for thicker materials. The hammer isn’t heavy enough but with some persuasion, it can work. The knife is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Badger

customer_reviews.title: Leather smelled bad
customer_reviews.text: Most of it was okay, but one of the awls was damaged and the leather pieces both smelled awful. Not sure I can use them, and even after airing out for several days they still smell bad. Cutting mat was kinda small but a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish There Was A Manual or Guide
customer_reviews.text: I'm just starting in leatherworking and bought this kit as baby's first leatherworking tools. They're great, and all seem to be of decent quality for the price, but man I wish they had a manual. I've no idea what is what and my tutorials and videos either don't have pictures of tools to use or don't state the tool being used. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Need to be good at sharpening.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and in excellent condition. The set came with a lot and I was impressed with the quality. That said, I did need to sharpen all the various cutting tools. I quick leather strop and rogue make them very effective at cutting leather. The thread for sewing the leather is excellent. A few items, I am still figuring how to use, but overall a very good set. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ross R. Witte II

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beginner Set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little set to get started with tooling and stamping leather. I wanted to give it a try without spending too much. This kit was perfect and I’m having a lot of fun learning techniques.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Howard

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fix a leather shoe that threads were coming off. It has many many items and thread colors. It does have curved needles that are really good. But unfortunately the needles are really brittle. Two of the needles broke instead of bending after a few thread passes.
customer_reviews.author: AMV19

customer_reviews.title: containt
customer_reviews.text: It a great item to have for leather repairs my husband has shoes he likes and wears them a lot and he brakes the buckle straps. The kit has the this to help repair them until the next time...
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L. Doane

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: It’s a usable kit but extremely cheap. I wouldn’t plan on using this professionally at all. However, if you’re like me and only need the bare minimum to make a belt or a holster every once in a while it will be fine for that.
customer_reviews.author: ADeaver

customer_reviews.title: Great value kit for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit includes a lot of different tools. Bought this as a starter kit for my husband. Has more than enough tools for beginner but doesn't have any instructions and how do you use it to look that up or buy an instruction book on leatherworking. Great value for the money. The tools are good quality leather so that you can practice right away if you didn't think to buy any.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great repair kit for a leather backpack
customer_reviews.text: The kit contains all of the components needed for a quick repair of a vintage backpack, the thread. Color was a perfect match and the leather thimble help in forcing the needle through the straps
customer_reviews.author: ♡Becoming_Me❤️💚🖤-doing good to all |Happy&Well

customer_reviews.title: Get it together help
customer_reviews.text: More tools then I thought I needed, however as a beginner I found use for some of those extras! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Veer

customer_reviews.title: good value for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but it was the most complete set I found for the price. I plan to use it to repair a small tear in a chair arm and I chose this set as most likely to have what I need now and for similar tasks in the future.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It worked. I repaired my sofa of 3,000 using this. It looks back like my sofa again stead of trashing it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: TRI D NGUYEN

customer_reviews.title: Upholstery kit has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Very good kit with everything I eeded to stich up the leather seat in my car.
customer_reviews.author: E. M.

customer_reviews.title: For the price it’s great
customer_reviews.text: A new sofa. A new cat. Not a good combo. I’ve never had a desire to stitch and sew. Managed to use without trashing a new couch. Comforter ordered next day via Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Noch Eins

customer_reviews.title: Best Beginner Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good set for the price and the swivel knife is nice, the stamps aren’t the most defined things but they still come out good enough!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Only for light duty maybe.
customer_reviews.text: Too flimsy for leather. Punch tool and leather needle broke in short order.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Templet

customer_reviews.title: Great kit. Would’ve loved instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, lots of pieces. Would’ve loved some info on what each tool was used for.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little kit, all you need for a quick shoe repair. Got me out of a bind.
customer_reviews.author: DiosmayaTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Lots of different tools
customer_reviews.text: I'm dabbling into leather items ,small ones. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Januaryice

customer_reviews.title: Total Crap, don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete crap as the thread breaks easily and one of the pins easily came out of the handle. Please don’t waste your money because the product of inferior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Kooko IV

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Finishing on the awl hole could have been better. Had to sand it a bit. It was cutting the thread when pushing the thread.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny123

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of leather tools
customer_reviews.text: Very good selection of leather supplies! Great for a beginner like me. Would recommend to a beginner in leather crafting.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband, he's going to use these tools to make a wallet. They're working great!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm just a beginner in leather craft making, this stuffs are really awesome. I learn how to make a bag from YouTube, there have exact WAYS on the use of the tools and that's interesting.You guys can also learn from it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky.Yu

customer_reviews.title: Rivets don’t work
customer_reviews.text: The rivets in my set did not work at all
customer_reviews.author: W. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Should come with some information
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a beginner kit for a teen. Should have read other reviews better which was my mistake. Rather big mistake as far as I'm concerned. As many other have mentioned, I expected it to at least have a description of the tools or even a page with simple line drawings of tools and the tool names to make it slightly easier to figure out how to make something. Unfortunately, this will probably end up in the pile of unusable crafting supplies at our house. Or get dropped off at GoodWill in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: KC06

product_meta.title: BUTUZE Versatile Leather Repair Purse Kit 34 PCS Leather Working Supplies,Leather Making Tool Kit with Awl,Waxed Thread,Groover, Wool Dauber, Leather Kits for Beginner
feature_bullets: Our 34-piece Leather Craft Tool Set has 2 stitching wheel tools,1 groover,3 sewing awls, 2 finger cots,1 thimble ring,3 nail files,1 A5 cutting mat ( 5.82inch×8.26inch),2 A5 leather skin (color random),4 waxed threads(55yards,red,natural color,dark khaki,black),1 beeswax,3 wool daubers ,1 needle kit,1 scissors,1 big v shaped groover,1 glue stick,1 ruler,which can meet your basic needs for leather making.

PRACTICAL TOOL SET:This basic leather craft kit including many leather craft tools which through the whole process of doing leather carving,and we also offer three pieces of leather for engraving,you can use the leather to improve your leather making skill.
GOOD PERSONALIZED TOOLS:If you want to seek your own style or want to be unique,you can use this leather making kit to make your special bags,wallets,key bags,which can also be used by beginners.

DURABLE, TOP QUALITY: All tools in our leather sewing kit are made with premium quality materials that guarantee longer lasting, satisfactory user experience. Even more, our craft supplies are perfectly safe on your hands. Buy with confidence!

GREAT GIFTING IDEA: If you are looking for a thoughtful gift for your special friend or family, or you want to design that unique leather gift then grab this needle and thread kit. Surprise the handyman in the family! Share and spread the love.
